responses: Hello! Welcome to University InfoBot. How can I assist you today?

patterns: what is the info you can give me
responses: I can help you with information about admissions, courses, departments, fees, and contact details. What would you like to know more about?
You can apply through our online portal. Visit university.edu/apply for more information.
We offer undergraduate and postgraduate programs in Science, Arts, Engineering, Business, and more.
Our university has departments such as Computer Science, Biology, Economics, Psychology, and more.
Tuition varies by program. Undergraduate programs start from $10,000 per year. Check our website for details.

patterns: who can I reach out to
responses: You can contact us at info@university.edu or call +1-800-UNI-INFO.
Goodbye! Feel free to ask more questions anytime.
